explains: n. 爆炸物，[化工]炸药；爆炸品（explosive 的复数）
wordGroup: explosive welding 爆炸焊接；爆炸成形
explosive gas 易爆气，爆炸气；爆炸性气体
high explosive 烈性炸药；高爆炸药；猛炸药
explosive force 爆炸力，爆破力
explosive atmosphere 易爆气体环境；爆燃性空气
explosive material 炸药；爆炸材料
explosive ordnance disposal 爆炸性军械处理

sentences.en: The utmost caution must be exercised when handling explosives.
sentences.cn: 处理爆炸品一定要慎之又慎。

sentences.en: The men were caught in the act of digging up buried explosives.
sentences.cn: 这些人在挖掩埋起来的炸药时被逮了个正着。

sentences.en: He was the mastermind behind the plan to acquire the explosives.
sentences.cn: 他是获取炸药计划的幕后操纵者。
